name: Interactive Space SDK
short_description: Interactive Space is a prototyping framework for rapid development of multitouch, paper, and gestural interaction on and above the desktop. Using a depth camera and projector it allows any physical tabletop to become an interactive surface, enabling interaction on and above the surface and with paper documents. The framework provides an SDK that allows developers to exploit any GUI framework that supports the TUIO protocol2. A semi-automatic calibration mechanism ensures easy setup and aids portability.
summary: Prototyping multitouch interaction on and above the desktop.
